mapper.select: select id,title from article ORDER BY readCount DESC limit #{top}
SELECT left(createTime, 7) AS month ,COUNT(*) AS count FROM article WHERE display=1 GROUP BY left(createTime, 7) ORDER BY left(createTime, 7) DESC LIMIT #{monthSize} ;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT category.id,category.name,category.createTime,count(article.title) AS count FROM category LEFT JOIN article ON article.categoryId = category.id WHERE category.name !="" AND article.display=1 GROUP BY category.id ORDER BY createTime DESC LIMIT #{top}) AS result WHERE count>0
